website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, very sturdy hook-on high chair with one of the highest weight limits of any brand.
pros: Has a weight limit of 60 lbs
(depending on the sturdiness of the table)
cons: Harness can be a bit tricky to fasten with an active child

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our seat. We bought it initially for camping. Fits perfect on state campground picnic tables. Then we said why stop there.. Fits on round Olive Garden tables and family diner tables. Our daughter has down syndrome and has a hard time using restaurant style high chairs. This is perfect for her. No way to slip out. She can slouch without getting hurt. And the back is high enough that I don't have to worry about her stability. Did I say yet how much I love this thing. PS... Written by the wife but hubs was sold when he read it holds up to 60 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: jerms

customer_reviews.title: Great way to secure chair to table
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited to use this on some upcoming travels! It is so hard to feed a baby while on the go, but this seat I think will be great for our needs. I like that the seat seems sturdy. My baby weighs 28 lbs and this seat holds him just fine. There is a buckle to hold him in securely. The way the seat hooks onto the side of the table or counter is unique from others I’ve seen but I feel that this seat is very secure because of that. One cosmetic flaw is that the item name is upside down on the chair but that didn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Easy and secure installation
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this at a friend's house a couple of weeks ago and my baby liked sitting in it, so I got one for her. I clipped it to my island in the kitchen, the installation was easy and secure. It's not easy for my mom to babysit all by herself during the day, now my mom just leaves her in this little chair, give her some crackers and water when my mom is cooking in the kitchen to keep her insight. The package also came with a carrying bag, it will be easy to take it with us if we go on a trip with the baby. I wish I knew about this item sooner.
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old grandson loves this chair! We have a bar high counter island that is our main place to eat. We clamped this chair onto it so he can be at the table with us. It is very sturdy and we have no concern of it coming loose. It is a deep almost bucket like seat so he can move around and even bounce a little without any concern of him getting out. He is 21 lbs and 27 inches and has plenty of room to grow in it😊
customer_reviews.author: Heather N. Voss

customer_reviews.title: Money well-invested.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Good size. Baby enjoyed sitting at the table with family instead of being confined to his car seat. I still pushed a chair behind/underneath him to quiet down my family members who worried that he'd fall. I had slight difficulty threading the bar through the slot when putting it together, but that was it. No biggie. Practice tightening and loosening the knobs and you'll get the hang of it. Doesn't require any disassembly to put it away. Tucks away nicely in its own tote.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Safe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cost performance: compared several brands of similar styles, this one is the most cost-effective, after receiving the product is very satisfied. Usage: the baby likes it very much. The seat is spacious, and the fat baby is OK to sit. Appearance material details: the material is very good, the base is very stable, the green is too good-looking, very atmospheric color
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a few friends that have babies that come over and we needed a high chair. When we heard of these we decided to go this route because we wouldn't have to have a bulky chair sitting around. We love that this one hooks to the table quickly and comes off quick. It also folds down almost flat so we just store it on a shelf in the closet. Love that the material wipes down good and comes right off so we can throw it in the washer especially now that flu season is coming.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up anywhere
customer_reviews.text: We recently ate at a breakfast place with some friends, one of my friend got a baby and the restaurant brought out an exactly same hook on chair, one of my other friend was like “omg, those are the best! three of my girls all used it. It’s the best thing we got for them instead of high chairs.” I listened and decided To get one. We opened it and it was so easy to set up at our dinning table or the island in our kitchen. It’s easy to fold and store away when not in use. Now I’m glad that we got one.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkysup670

customer_reviews.title: Super-easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take to restaurants that didn't seem to have a high chair for our granddaughter. It works wonderfully. It takes a minute to get used to letting it just hang there, assuming it isn't going to fall. It isn't! This chair connects in a way that it has no chance of falling off, so there are no worries. She loves it and we love how unobtrusive this is. Two thumbs up here.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

customer_reviews.title: Washes and travels well
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I’ve had this for about six months. Just washed it for the first time (only use it on vacations or on occasion) after painting ornaments with my two year old. It was a complete mess with paint as you can imagine. It was so easy to take apart and put back together. Very impressed. Washed great. Really works well for involving a toddler in baking or crafts. He loves it. He is tall and about 30 lbs and fits great. Also works on picnic tables, good for camping.
customer_reviews.author: InMyPrime

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy and fast to use
customer_reviews.text: Solidly attaches to tables, we have used so far on a picnic table and regular dining room table. The parts that attach to the table can move side to side so for instance, on a table with spaces, you could move to a solid area to attach. It's so easy to put on. It takes a few seconds to adjust and tighten and that's it. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Mommato3

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived as described and on time. It was easy to put together and do not have any problems with my 6 month old sitting it in. The one thing I noticed others mentioning is the limitation to the width of the table. While currently we don't have that issue with ours, I could see how that might be a problem for some with this chair. Otherwise, then chair is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Best travel chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: We take it everywhere and it fits everywhere! My daughter gets to be a part of the dinner table all the times and she loves it. And it's so compact it's easy to carry too. We took it to grandma's house for Thanksgiving, and even though her dining room is small, we all fit at the table comfortably as there was no bulky high chair to make room for. Best purchase for parents on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: The seats are strong
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is sturdy enough and we really liked it for the first few months (although it’s a pain to remove to clean and gets real nasty real fast). Once our baby hit 10 months though we could no longer use it because he crawls right out (even when we strap him in as tight as it goes). It really needs to have over the shoulder straps to keep active little babies in place. We can no longer use it because it’s simply unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this chair and highly recommend! Our daughter is 7 months and we have been using this since she was 6 months. We take it to friends and restaurants and always get compliments on it. It is so much more sanitary than restaurant high chairs. You can fold it up and leave it in your car when ever you need too. This is my new go to gifts for friends having babies! Also quite easy to wash and dry. I recommend seller to add other color options than green.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus.M

customer_reviews.title: This ripped in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this. It's a great little chair. But it ripped in less than a month and I cannot use it anymore. I am extremely unhappy. My son is not even 30lbs;
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !!!!!! Easy to clean and use. Sold !
customer_reviews.text: Spent a long time comparing these. I tend to lean with known brands for baby gear especially something of this nature. I was just going to go with the chicco but reading the reviews changed. Loved the price reviews and features of this. Did not disappoint. Stop what you’re doing and buy now !
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Space saving seating
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for those visiting babies. East to assemble and store... Takes way less space than hard baby seats.
customer_reviews.author: DCofWV

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the chair literally fell out while my son was sitting in it. Luckily it was hanging on be enough threads to prevent him from crashing to the floor. This was after owning the product for just a few months. It is clearly not safe. I would like a refund but apparently my window to return the item closed just a few days after purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren for our camper. It clipped securely in the camper and on a picnic table. You can take the cloth seat completely off to wash, which I did, and it came out beautiful. It comes with a carrying bag so it's easy to bring anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this seat since November and it is already falling apart. I cant put my 18 month old (20lbs) in it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is very simple. You can do it by yourself
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome. It's easy to assemble. It does come with its own carrying bag. Make sure you read the instructions, otherwise you won't know where the bag is. Lol. It's ticked away inside a pouch because it's actually attached to the seat itself! So awesome. It doesn't take up a lot of space assembled on the counter like some chairs I've seen. And it has room for growth. So far I'm loving this.
customer_reviews.author: nick Pang

customer_reviews.title: Pass the quality standard
customer_reviews.text: It's very good. I thought it was very complicated to install at first. It took a few minutes to install it. I tried it. It was very strong and could bear the weight of the baby. I can put my baby on the floor to play. I don't need to worry about the baby running around. It's a perfect product for people who often take care of their babies at home
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Chin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler high chair  alternative
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 25 pound year-old grandson who was visiting. The chair is well made, sturdy and works perfectly on my kitchen counter. It was easy to assemble, easy to attach to the counter and had a comfortable seat and safety strap. It is lightweight, folds up flat for storage when not in use. I love everything about this seat, including the price.
customer_reviews.author: gramsters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, high appearance
customer_reviews.text: The baby began to eat complementary food. He wanted to exercise his hands-on ability when he was young. He always paid attention to the dining chair. The appearance of the dining chair was so bad that he could adjust the height and the back of the chair by himself. Installation is also very simple, very solid, reliable, no flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher lontine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Made my baby happier since she was closer to the table. Very easy to put together and put on the table. Very compact and easy to travel with. This is great if your on the go and may not have access to a high chair. Was convient to put diaper bag under the seat since there is no legs. I really reccomend. I can't wait to use it camping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kosik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable, and compact for travel.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this chair folds up so easy and compactly and then has its own durable carry bag to take along that stores in a pocket on back of chair during use sold me instantly! I was able to use the chair withing five minutes after getting out of box and we are thrilled with it. Such a space saver too. Clean up is a breeze with the material used. Super sturdy design and works well with our table.
customer_reviews.author: Urton

customer_reviews.title: Very good. The product is of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I think it's very worthwhile to spend a little extra money on this project, after owning it. Great look and great function. My family of three can now sit at the table together. The clamp is very safe. And the material is easy to clean. The chair is portable, very good. It's good for restaurants or family visits. Very solid, fit and complete, design and functionality above expectations
customer_reviews.author: babay

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my one-year-old, so that he can eat or drink milk at the table. Baby likes him very much, which makes me feel very happy. In the future travel or travel, it can be easily carried, put in the car or in the restaurant, which will make us more convenient
customer_reviews.author: ilja haverkorn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work with All Tables
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this is not designed to fit every table. Won't work if your table has a lip.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bellman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent High Chair Alternative for Small Spaces and Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair for a friend of mine. We tested it on her island counter and it fits really well. The chair looks absolutely awesome once clamped on the counter. Easy to assemble and disassemble, feels sturdy and secure with a five-point safety harness system, clearly a space saver comparing to those bulky old fashioned high chair. We all love that it comes with a carrying bag it's very light weight. Removable seat pad is great and convenient. It's definitely an unique baby gift to new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Chun C.

customer_reviews.title: It's great on the whole
customer_reviews.text: This color is more resistant to dirty, the baby does not have to hold it when eating, Baoma is much more labor-saving, baby sitting is very comfortable, baby can play for a long time, very obedient and willing to sit. The quality is good, very good, the quality is good, the baby can sit on it to eat and play with toys, really very good, very stable, the baby sat for the first time also very like, the price is not expensive, the style is novel, eating dirty wipe on the line, overall is very good
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for my twins to save space in our kitchen. They work great! Very safe, secure, easy to clean. My only concern is that one of them has been stitched completely different than the other and whoever gets in that chair slumps forward as you can see in my picture. I haven't been able to reach anyone at Toogle to help me.
customer_reviews.author: teach4456

customer_reviews.title: High cost performance
customer_reviews.text: This dining chair is very cost-effective. It can exercise your baby to eat by himself or free his hands. Your baby likes to play with toys and eat. Installation is also convenient and adjustable! It's the first time to cultivate your baby to eat with heart. Most of all, it has no taste.
customer_reviews.author: Siddhartha Henzie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Great price and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a portable high chair for baby for vacation and for on the go. We love the fabric and how easy it is to set up. It’s perfect to grow with baby. The back has a high support for a baby like ours who likes to lean back! Couldn’t be happier with our purchase! Comes with a bag carrier as well! Love that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Vanderlugt

customer_reviews.title: A great chair for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves this chair as she can sit with the rest of the family during meals. The chair is VERY sturdy and looks like it will be easy to clean. Easy assembly as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Our house is a tight squeeze and we didn’t know how to add one more to the table since there is little room. This is great and sturdy. The screws Tk hold it take a minute to figure out. My 3 year old son climbed in when we weren’t looking, I yelled at him, but that thing didn’t budge. It actually made me feel a little better.
customer_reviews.author: LogansMom

customer_reviews.title: The hook on chair is relatively easy to put together and use
customer_reviews.text: The hook on chair is relatively easy to put together and use. Make sure that you actually tighten down with the knobs all the way. We used it with our friends 1 year old when they come over and the harness holds him in securely. One thing to make absolutely certain is that the table itself is sturdy and can take the weight of the baby hooked into the side.
customer_reviews.author: L D

customer_reviews.title: Good helper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hook on chair for my daughter. I used it for the table, and It was easy to install. However, at first, she refused to sit on it. It has an adjustable safety belt which keeps my child safety when she struggles on it. After several attempts, she eventually accepted it. And recently, she gets used to using it. It helps me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MIN

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like my purchase so far. My 10 month old son was always so mad that he couldn't see what I was doing when I cooked in the kitchen. Now he can sit at the bar and have a snack while he watches me. I love that I don't have to drag his big highchair into the kitchen every time I cook. It works perfectly. I was nervous my bar top was too shallow because we have cabinets underneath and I didn't think his legs would fit, but there is plenty of room for him to grow. Overall I love it.
customer_reviews.author: omare

customer_reviews.title: Best Light weight portable chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great travel seat option. It is easy to clean and use and fold. there is even a carry bag. This is the 2nd clip on chair that i’ve purchased. The other was a name brand and it was hard to inclip and clean plus it was big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: B. L.

customer_reviews.title: Missing tote bag!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect chair for a counter top or any table that doesn’t have a thick boarder to the top. I have been trying to get the carrying bag that’s supposed to be in the back flap which is also a great storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good looking high chair
customer_reviews.text: It is compact, so simple to set up, and simple to fold down!. The cover can be removed for washing. The portability is phenomenal, and I can take it when we go out to eat. The material is durable, and easy to clean. I would recommend this high chair becasude I don’t have to clean the around legs of a regular chair. This chair is the least amount of cleaning required. It’s very wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Xinyi

customer_reviews.title: Great baby chair
customer_reviews.text: Its a great chair, strong and sturdy, easy to assemble and easy to attach to table. Its a perfect option to replace high chair and have baby sitting by the table with the whole family. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Luda

customer_reviews.title: Better than any high chair, and baby gets in on the action!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even on our weird table. The seat comes with a hard insert that doesn't fit in far enough for the velcro to attach and keep it in. Weird, but you just have to stuff it back in every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Barco

customer_reviews.title: Parents must have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy attaching to surfaces, sturdy and super compact. It latches on one level surfaces- most outdoor tables.
customer_reviews.author: peri

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get off once mounted, but we love this item. It’s a huge relief to be able to take baby out to dinner and be at family functions where she can sit at a table with us instead of the hassle of dragging a stroller or car seat wherever we go. We use this every day, our baby sits at our kitchen table in it while I prepare bottles, or have a quick meal / snack. Highly recommend & worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Easter

customer_reviews.title: Great clamp on high chair!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to take this with us on a flight but it’s too heavy. However, it is an AWESOME clamp on high chair. We now use it at our second home which has a suitable table! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 😊😊
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. My friend saw it very much after I saw it. In the days when his son was full of hundred days. I decided to give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Works for my 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: It made me nervous, but I saw a friend use something like this on their kid and decided to get one for our bar area so little one can watch me as I cook in the kitchen. Holds her weight fine and saves space!
customer_reviews.author: comp_g33k

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 9-month daughter. Put the chair on the table, and the baby’s sight is the same as the adult when eating. My daughter likes to sit!
customer_reviews.author: youyoujanna

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart, doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when we got this chair because of how easy it was to clean. Unfortunately it didn’t last very long. The whole bottom is ripping off quickly. I wish I had spent the extra bucks and gotten a Phil and Ted’s chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seat - little difficult to remove child by yourself
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this seat, and so did our grandson but it was very difficult to pull him out of the chair without the help of a second person. The actual bottom part of the seat would come up when I tried to lift him out by myself, causing his legs to get stuck in the leg holes. He would end up crying due to the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Normal

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with how great this chair is! I'm am all about space saving since I have 4 kids ages 6 and under and needed a portable space saving chair for my 5 month old. Assembly was easy and the fabric of the chair is easily cleaned. This chair is easy to pack along (it came with its own travel bag) and use on the go and would be perfect to take along traveling or camping since it doesn't take up much space at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney N. Van Veldhuizen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Grand child
customer_reviews.text: When we raised our kids we never had high chairs, always had table chairs. This is a new version of what we had back in the day. We love that this chair is strong and the material is washable. Very sturdy and holds to the table securely. Very happy and yes if we need a second one we would buy the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Babies love to be a part of family!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 mo old granddaughter. She loved being able to sit at the table with us in a restaurant. Had a great carrying case in which to store. Easy to put on table and lockdown for safety. She loved it so much I gave to with mom and dad to put in their automobile for use.
customer_reviews.author: rogerbuilder1

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and fold away as well. Carrying bag makes it easy to travel with. The seat clamps on very tightly and the soft sides seem comfortable to sit in for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing!! This is the only high chair my son wouldn’t scream when I put them in. It attaches to my table perfectly and it is so easy to get him in and out of it. The material doesn’t wipe off that easily but the entire cover can be thrown in the wash so that’s totally fine. Overall, pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Organ

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very good quality, very strong and safe .pretty easy to assemble. It is also convenient to eat out and travel. It is highly recommended that all mothers should be buy one .
customer_reviews.author: Sssusan

customer_reviews.title: this babychair so helpful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, portable, and travel-friendly. It is super easy to install . I love the quality of the fabric also. I put some muslin cloth to give more support because my baby still 6months and he still learning to sit.
customer_reviews.author: linzhen

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Very very simple to set up and use. It feels very secure on the table and with my little one in it. Not difficult to clean either. Thinking about getting another for my mom’s house!
customer_reviews.author: S. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Best chair!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this clip on chair because we hated going out to eat or to a family function and trying to locate something to sit our child in. Everywhere we go, we get compliments on this chair and how well it works. It’s super easy to assemble and clip on to a table. We are impressed at the durability!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Super buy
customer_reviews.text: great hook on baby chair. easy to install and durable. Safety is my first concerns save space in my small apartment. My baby is happy to seat on it. I can have dinner with my baby in same table right now. Very excited. recommend
customer_reviews.author: Waz up

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to set up at restaurants
customer_reviews.text: It is so convenient to set up at a dining table when I take my baby out for lunch/dinner. It is a little heavy to carry it out; at the same time, I have my baby in my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: I chose the green color just want to clean it easily, easy to set and remove, the material is soft and i added a blanket that make the seat more cute and comfortable. The size of the chair just right for baby sit there and hangout with family.
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: This fit great on our table. Use it for grand daughter. Less cumbersome than a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: TUTU

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for when my grandson come to spend time at our house. Stores away easily, feels very sturdy and safe. I know we will get lots of use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: MommaDowdy

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels sturdy, easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it 4 stars because it assembled easily and fit the table and counter top great and looks and feels sturdy. I ordered it for my grandson so we can use it when he comes to visit in June.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy46

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy super safe super secure
customer_reviews.text: If you are a camper do not hesitate by this product it is perfect it does everything it says it is super secure it's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments on this everywhere we go. So much easier than the restaurant high chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Stephani

customer_reviews.title: His weight bearing is also very good.
customer_reviews.text: The dining table and chair I bought for my baby before was very uncomfortable to make. Then I bought this for him. It is really good. The baby sits in it very safely and can be observed at any time. His weight bearing is also very good. It can be put in the back. Baby's toys or wipes are very user-friendly
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This has been so easy to use and nice to travel with. It’s really easy to put together and put on tables. I’d highly recommend this. It’s getting better for us to use now that she’s older and taller. When we first used it 6 mos she was too low at the table. She’s 8 mos and she’s able to reach the table now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Francis

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfy but not as durable as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I love how big the seat in this chair is but the grips for the table have worn loose in less than 6 weeks of useage. Good for an occasional use but maybe not long term at a countertop at your home as the grips do wear and then cause shifting of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: sara symank

customer_reviews.title: Nearly impossible to install
customer_reviews.text: Seems like quality product but takes us 10+ minutes every time to secure it to a table properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dan T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Super easy to use and great to just throw in the washer when it gets dirty. Included travel bag make taking it anywhere a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this so far. Very sturdy and easy to use. I like the bag it comes with for when we’re out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky#1

customer_reviews.title: Good chair but tricky tonget out of
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair however its difficult to pull my baby out as her legs get stuck

customer_reviews.title: This chair is great! We bought it for our granddaughter

It's especially useful when his family travels around and needs a small chair to fit his height. It's really stable and convenient to carry around. I think this chair will easily fit most children. I recommend it!

product_meta.title: Hook On Chair, Safe and High Load Design, Fold-Flat Storage and Tight Fixing Clip on Table High Chair, Removable Seat Cushion, Attach to Fast Table Chair (Dark Green)
feature_bullets: Fast Table Chair: Hook on highchair be used only for table 0.79" to 3.15" ,thick(20mm-80 mm), note the table lip offset and thickness to match. Feeding booster seat join Non-slip soft plastic arms to protect tables from being scratched.

Safety Protection: Portable counter table chair to prevent standing up and slipping down, Multi-needle sutured fabric to avoid being cracked. Precise and patented module parts to assure the chair can be easily tightened up and firmly fixed with a table.

Fold-and-Go Design: Travel high chair just need only 20s quick installation and disassembled, space saving to store, only 4lbs weight to conveniently travel with the carrying bag. All parts can be easily removable,making it easy to hide away or take on the go.
Durable & Washable Materials: Ideal for babies & toddlers between 6 and 36 months, and up to 37 pounds, the durable & washable design ensures this product will serve for a long time.

Friendly Fabric: Baby feeding seat use steel stainless clamp and AL-alloy frame support, 600D nviroment friendly fabric seat with rear pocket for wipes and toys, thickened seat cushion, fabric can be can be easily cleaned.

specifications.Safety warning: Check the table thickness and ensure your installation is safe and reliable before using for your babies, keep your babies in sight.
specifications.Additional product features: Carry Bag, Outdoor use, Folds Compactly, Storage Pocket, Indoor use, Fastens Securely, Removable Seat Pad, Rubberized Arms, 5-Point Harness
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
